foundingStory.title: Founding story
foundingStory.content: Minerva is a digital platform that connects readers, publishers, and magazines in one seamless experience. We provide instant access to hundreds of newspapers and magazines anytime, anywhere. For publishers, we offer simple integrations and valuable insights. For readers, we create an inspiring and convenient space to discover new stories.

ourMission.title: Our mission
ourMission.content: We believe great stories deserve to be shared and accessible to everyone. Our mission is to help publishers grow, expand readers' horizons, and bridge the gap between creators and their audiences. We are building a place where the love of reading meets innovation and where journalism and creativity truly thrive.

mission.text: We believe great stories deserve to be shared — and easily accessible to everyone. Our platform brings magazines, publishers, and readers together in one seamless experience. Inspired by the love of reading and the power of connection, we help publishers reach wider audiences while giving readers instant access to a world of knowledge, inspiration, and entertainment. With technology at heart and people at the center, we're building more than just a subscription service — we're creating a place where quality journalism and creativity thrive. For publishers, we offer simple integrations and valuable insights. For readers, we open the door to hundreds of publications, anytime and anywhere. We're proud to support publishers' work, empower readers, and shape the future of magazine publishing — one story at a time.
